item.title: Predictive Intellisense in PowerShell
item.description: Introduction If you are using PowerShell (pwsh) on a daily basis like me, you should take a look at enabling Predictive IntelliSense in your pwsh prompt. It was announced in late 2020 but I dont think that many people are aware and have it enabled in their pwsh profile. You can think of Predictive IntelliSense like taking tab completion to the next level. How to Check that you have (PSReadLine) minimum version 2.
